data.answer: The main focus is on developing a new porous coordination framework for methane storage with exceptional methane uptakes and adsorption enthalpies.

data.question: What is the significance of the pore size/shape in the new MOF described in the paper?
data.answer: The pore size/shape is significant because it allows for strong binding and close packing of methane molecules, enhancing methane storage capacity.

data.answer: The volumetric working capacity of the new MOF is similar to HKUST-1, higher than most other MOFs, but only slightly lower than several MOFs with framework flexibility or very large pore volumes/surface areas.
